messages.msgSnippet: orrrrrrr, how about the Wal Mart (I think it was WM) commercial w/ dad racing up/down the aisles throwing school supplies in the basket while the kids stood @
messages.messageBody:
orrrrrrr, how about the Wal Mart (I think it was WM) commercial w/ dad
racing up/down the aisles throwing school supplies in the basket while the
kids stood @ the end of the aisle looking SO FORLORNED!!! I thought that
was *SAD* ... ohhhhh, I HOPE AND PRAY I *NEVER* snuff out my fellas desire
to *LEARN* ...

Pris
WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...


----- Original Message -----
From: "Lynda" <lurine@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, September 04, 2000 1:18 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] TX TAAS test

> How about the commercials last year about back to school shopping and the
> dad drives away with the bag on top of the car and the kids are totally
> delighted that all the school stuff is sailing off and down the road.
>
> Lynda
